INSOMNEA art

Bedtime Story

Bedtime story is a small endless runner that I created with a group consisting of one other designer as well as two programmers in our first semester. You play as a boy who woke up in a nightmare and you have to run from your demons. Don't let them get you!

My contributions to this project:

  • Pixel art 2D assets
  • Animations
  • Character concept art
  • Soundeffects
  • Storyboarding
  • UI

For this project we had the constraint that it had to be a 2D game developed in Unity and we could only use two buttons on the keyboard.
